name: Shreeji Controls
overview: Since our commencement is in year 2004, we “Shreeji Controls” are a prominent organization, engaged in manufacturing and supplying a commendable array of Control Panel, Textile Machine Panel, Coating Machine Panel, AC Drive and Electric Controller. Besides, we offer Machinery Parts Repairing Service and Plastic Machinery Repairing & Job Work Service to our clients’. Our offered range encompasses of Hot Lamination Control Panel, Mangle Dyingrage Synchronous Control Panel, Plastic Machinery Panel and Double Layer Coating Machine Panel. In addition to this, we also offer Tension Controller, PID Controller, Synchronous Card, Remote Control Box, Remote Box are few to name. Based in Ahmedabad (Gujarat), India, since inception, ours is a Sole Proprietorship (Individual) firm. High tensile strength, low maintenance, easy operation, low power consumption, high functionality, longer service life, corrosion resistance, dimensional accuracy, robust construction and sturdy design are some of the highlighting features, due to which our offered products are highly acknowledged in the market. Praised for above mentioned features, our offered products find their application in various industries like automobiles, construction and engineering sectors.
